# === Node.js ===
# AI-irrelevant files for Node.js projects
# Generated by ainit.dev

# Dependencies
node_modules/

# Lock files (large, no AI value)
package-lock.json
yarn.lock
pnpm-lock.yaml
bun.lockb

# Debug logs
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
lerna-debug.log*

# npm cache
.npm/

# Yarn
.yarn/cache/
.yarn/unplugged/
.yarn/install-state.gz
.pnp.*

# Build output
dist/
build/
out/

# Coverage
coverage/
.nyc_output/

# Cache
.cache/
.eslintcache
.parcel-cache/
